A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''April 14, 2010''', which fixed a bug from [[Infdev 20100413]].

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Placing [[torch]]es, [[sapling]]s and [[flower]]s no longer crashes the game.
* There's no more random lag spikes when you update the chunk.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Lag spikes still occur randomly due to high chunk updates. This wasn't fixed until [[Infdev 20100420]].
